Headline: #3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive, 4 Cottage Grove buses temp. rerouted NB: Michigan, Madison, State, Ohio & Michigan; SB: Michigan, Ontario, State, Washington & Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive, #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions  due to street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Madison, State, Ohio and Michigan.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State, Washington and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: NB 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, State and Randolph: due to, street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, State and Randolph: due to, street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express Temporary Reroute near Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: 146 Inner Lk Shre/Michigan Exp buses temp. rerouted SB: Michigan, Ontario, State & Adams; NB: Roosevelt, State, Ohio & Michigan due to, street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#146 Inner Lake Shore/Michigan Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

Southbound buses will operate via Michigan, Ontario, State and Adams.

Northbound buses will operate via Roosevelt, State, Ohio and Michigan.

Allow extra travel time.
